datasets.name: 6efa5ddc
queryLines:
SELECT
    CAST(BUSINESS_DATE AS DATE) AS BUSINESS_DATE,
    date_format(CAST(BUSINESS_DATE AS DATE), 'dd-MM-yyyy') AS BUSINESS_DATE_FMT,
    STORE_REGION,
    STORE_FORMAT,
    CURRENCY,
    PRODUCT_CODE,
    PRODUCT_DESC,
    PRODUCT_DEPARTMENT,
    PRODUCT_CLASS,
    SUPPLIER_NAME,
    CHANNEL_NAME,
    STORE_ID,
    STORE_NAME,
    STORE_CITY,
    TOTAL_SALE_TAX,
    GROSS_MARGIN,
    PCT_GROSS_MARGIN,
    TOTAL_TRANSACTIONS,
    AVG_TICKET,
    TOTAL_UNITS
FROM workspace.operations.gold_sales_daily_summary

datasets.name: cd9572b5
queryLines:
SELECT
    CAST(BUSINESS_DATE AS DATE) AS BUSINESS_DATE,
    STORE_REGION,
    STORE_FORMAT,
    CURRENCY,
    PRODUCT_CODE,
   PRODUCT_DESC,
    PRODUCT_DEPARTMENT,
    PRODUCT_CLASS
    SUPPLIER_NAME,
    CHANNEL_NAME,
    STORE_ID,
    STORE_NAME,
    STORE_CITY,
    GROSS_MARGIN,
    PCT_GROSS_MARGIN,
    TOTAL_SALE_TAX
FROM workspace.operations.gold_sales_daily_summary

datasets.name: 924cc311
queryLines:
SELECT 
    s.PRODUCT_DESC,
    SUM(s.TOTAL_SALE_TAX) AS TOTAL_SALE_TAX
FROM workspace.operations.gold_sales_daily_summary s
JOIN workspace.operations.gold_dim_product p
    ON s.PRODUCT_CODE = p.ITEM  -- o el campo que haga match entre ventas y productos
WHERE 
    (ARRAY_SIZE(:region) = 0 OR array_contains(:region, s.STORE_REGION))
    AND (ARRAY_SIZE(:format) = 0 OR array_contains(:format, s.STORE_FORMAT))
    AND (ARRAY_SIZE(:currency) = 0 OR array_contains(:currency, s.CURRENCY))
    AND (s.BUSINESS_DATE >= :fecha.min AND s.BUSINESS_DATE <= :fecha.max)
    AND p.STATUS = 'A'   -- FILTRO NUEVO: solo productos activos
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY TOTAL_SALE_TAX DESC
LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: 6cb1963d
queryLines:
SELECT 
    s.STORE_NAME,
    s.STORE_CITY,
    SUM(s.TOTAL_SALE_TAX)/1000 AS TOTAL_SALE_TAX,
    SUM(s.GROSS_MARGIN)/1000 AS GROSS_MARGIN,     
    AVG(s.PCT_GROSS_MARGIN) AS PCT_MARGIN     
FROM workspace.operations.gold_sales_daily_summary s
JOIN workspace.operations.gold_dim_organization o
    ON s.STORE_ID = o.STORE_ID  -- unimos por el ID de la tienda
WHERE 
    (ARRAY_SIZE(:region) = 0 OR array_contains(:region, s.STORE_REGION))
    AND (ARRAY_SIZE(:format) = 0 OR array_contains(:format, s.STORE_FORMAT))
    AND (ARRAY_SIZE(:currency) = 0 OR array_contains(:currency, s.CURRENCY))
    AND (s.BUSINESS_DATE >= :fecha.min AND s.BUSINESS_DATE <= :fecha.max)
    AND o.STORE_ACTIVE = 'Y'  -- FILTRO NUEVO: solo tiendas activas
GROUP BY 
    s.STORE_NAME, 
    s.STORE_CITY
ORDER BY TOTAL_SALE_TAX DESC
LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: 10b834de
queryLines:
SELECT 
    s.SUPPLIER_NAME,
    SUM(s.TOTAL_SALE_TAX) AS TOTAL_SALE_TAX
FROM workspace.operations.gold_sales_daily_summary s
JOIN workspace.operations.gold_dim_supplier sup
    ON s.SUPPLIER_NAME = sup.SUP_NAME  -- o usar s.SUPPLIER = sup.SUPPLIER si coincide mejor
WHERE 
    (ARRAY_SIZE(:region) = 0 OR array_contains(:region, s.STORE_REGION))
    AND (ARRAY_SIZE(:format) = 0 OR array_contains(:format, s.STORE_FORMAT))
    AND (ARRAY_SIZE(:currency) = 0 OR array_contains(:currency, s.CURRENCY))
    AND (s.BUSINESS_DATE >= :fecha.min AND s.BUSINESS_DATE <= :fecha.max)
    AND sup.SUP_STATUS = 'A'  -- FILTRO NUEVO: solo proveedores activos
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY TOTAL_SALE_TAX DESC
LIMIT 5;

lines: Todas las ventas incluyen impuestos **Nota:** Para efectos de esta prueba t칠cnica, se asume una tasa de cambio ficticia de 1 USD = 1 VES, con el fin de evitar distorsi칩n en los totales . En un escenario real, se usar칤a la tasa de cambio diaria correspondiente.
